search.query: index=* host=$host$ tag=oshost tag=performance tag=storage (read_ops=* OR write_ops=* OR mount=*) | stats latest(total_ops) as TotalOps, latest(read_ops) as ReadOps, latest(write_ops) as WriteOps by mount | eval "Total Ops/s" = round(TotalOps, 2) | eval "Read Ops/s" = round(ReadOps, 2) | eval "Write Ops/s" = round(WriteOps, 2) | fields - TotalOps, ReadOps, WriteOps | rename mount as "Device" | search "Total Ops/s"=*
